html:
5.21.18  1:35 pm   When are you gonna upload again?

     when the item to be uploaded is finished

5.21.18  1:35 pm   Hey bill,you've been kinda dead for a while now,

     that's not true

      are you ok?

     yes, are you

5.21.18  1:14 pm   make a new song

     i've been making one ever since i finished my previous one

5.21.18  1:09 pm   how do i get over my anxieties and awkwardness and just fucking dance with someone?

     that seems awkward

5.21.18  12:46 pm   is math even necessary

      maybe not

5.21.18  12:02 pm   You mentioned preferring nowadays to release songs individually so people can listen and group them however they want; your early pages on band camp and whatnot had songs in albums. Was that just because it was the only format allowed, or did your view on albums/songs change?

     those were retroactively collected and titled. i could do the same for all my other music since then but it is not a good use of my time

5.21.18  11:56 am   COLORS! WOW.

     that's true

5.21.18  11:54 am   u ever just vocally improvise riffs?

     sure

5.21.18  11:15 am   When do you plan on making your next longer format video?

     longer than what

5.21.18  10:29 am   Who was/is the nicest Beatle? And who was the best musically?

      lucy, from lucy in the sky

5.21.18  10:07 am   have you ever tried living in a tree?  i've been doing it for 10 months now and I highly recommend.

      i am tree

5.21.18  9:59 am   How much money is enough?

      1 hundred €

5.21.18  9:35 am   how do i start making music? im really interested in it but i dont know where to start, and im gonna have a lot of free time to waste soon as well so yeah man do you have any advice

     for me it was completely irresistible, on very many levels, as early as i can possibly remember

5.21.18  9:26 am   how to feel more real? more pure?

      try water

5.21.18  8:56 am   favourite toy?

     the global economy

5.21.18  8:55 am   hi, i think i might be crazy because i had a panic attack before going on stage even though i really wanted to do it. i thought panic attacks were only for things u didn't wanna do?? i am confused and distressed

     it was an excitement attack

5.21.18  8:55 am   what do you think about southwest kansas?

     it is wonderful, and beautiful

5.21.18  8:39 am   did you go to new canaan before or after making the song?

     during and before

5.21.18  7:42 am   hey i gotta do this project its kinda cancerous can you do it for me? 

     oh i love cancerous projects. maybe i can get cancer from it

5.21.18  7:21 am   i am writing this from a school what is your opinion on schools?

      they can be new, or old

5.21.18  7:02 am   Hey, im very anti-social and i sound really awkward in conversations. How do i build up self confidence?

     get a job where you have to talk to people every day

5.21.18  6:49 am   has anything gone wrong?

     yes but it's going to be fine

5.21.18  6:43 am   what about ducks

     oh i almost forgot about ducks

5.21.18  6:05 am   did other people tell you to upload videos to youtube?

     yes

5.21.18  5:47 am   do you think teachers would use your history of the entire world, i guess video in their classes?

     they often do

5.21.18  3:04 am   Is google evil 

     yes but no

5.21.18  1:08 am   how do you get out of a rut?

     jump and leap

5.21.18  12:46 am   Why do I feel inferior and superior to others at the same time, all the time? How do I stop?

     go to mars?

5.21.18  12:18 am   every time i leave a social situation like a party or wedding or something i always feel massive amounts of regret and guilt feeling like i didn't do enough to interact w ppl to show that i enjoyed being around them. i feel so horribly awkward and i hate it !  what do i do ? pls help

      have your own party, and let everyone else feel guilty for leaving

5.20.18  11:24 pm   The hair stylist keeps talking about mass shootings and war. If I go to someone else and she finds out, is she going to hate me?

      maybe but hopefully also learn a valuable lesson about customer retention

5.20.18  11:04 pm   What is your opinion on lightbulbs?

     it takes a whole team of paleantologists to change one

5.20.18  10:59 pm   Is it easier to mail yourself in a letter or a package when traveling long distance? (Asking for a friend)

     email

5.20.18  10:49 pm   how do you remain so positive

     5.17.17  6:03 pm

5.20.18  10:07 pm   Turn down for what?

      a moment of reflective thought?

5.20.18  9:30 pm   so how did you realize that there were no rules ro songwiritng?

     i tried something that i thought must be against the rules but the cops didn't come

5.20.18  9:25 pm   what's the weather like in new york this time of year?

     up and down

5.20.18  9:23 pm   there are no more numbers. they do not exist. i deleted them all

     oh that's too bad

5.20.18  9:18 pm   how do i know you are bill wurtz

     i don't know. how do i know

5.20.18  9:04 pm   any hints about the next song?

     sure

5.20.18  8:43 pm   Did you actually go to New Canaan?

     yes

5.20.18  8:37 pm   Is this a stupid question?

     yes, and smart

5.20.18  7:49 pm   Could you tell us more about yourself?

     sure

5.20.18  7:43 pm   how does life? very confuzled

     scientists are still trying to figure out

5.20.18  7:07 pm   What are the meanings of your songs

     you will have to listen and see

5.20.18  7:06 pm   What are colors?

     they are like flavors of light

5.20.18  7:05 pm   How does life do life?

     scientists are still trying to figure out

5.20.18  6:45 pm   how to fix a chair?

     first you must diagnose the problem

5.20.18  6:40 pm   in what format should i quickly document song ideas? i seem to let many sit in my brain's holding cell for too long and they begin to fade away

     always document them immediately. nowadays the best way is probably just a simple audio recording, sing the thing, with a proper count-off, properly demonstrate where the root of the key is, and any other specifics you need to mention

5.20.18  6:39 pm   how do i choose notes for the sort of atonal scale runs i hear so often in your music?

     you could just listen closely and try to ascertain note by note what they are

5.20.18  6:06 pm   Was there really a girl who made you feel blue because she said that you should stay in school?

     yes
